ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisRe-appointment of JOSEPH KENNETH PEREIRA of Ottawa, Ontario, as a temporary member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months, on a part-time basis.
